adjectives.description: syrtic (comparative more syrtic, superlative most syrtic)

entries.meaning: Of or relating to a syrt; boggy; resembling quicksand.
examples: The marshy ground gradually disappeared, and the rest of the Syrtic region, though arid and dreary in a high degree, presented from time to time little valleys or detached spots, the verdure of which afforded an agreeable relief.
